data.name: Dodge Dots - Fight the Scammers DLC
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains nothing but a warm, fuzzy feeling for supporting a good cause.

All revenue from purchasing this DLC goes directly to the Steam group Asset Flip Reviews to fund buying newly asset flip games in order to be able to warn other Steam users by posting reviews.

Oh, but you do get a nice icon on your player character in-game. That's more than any asset flip will give you.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This DLC grants you nothing but the warm, fuzzy feeling of having done a good deed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
